name: Keeper of the Cosmic Birds
description:
Please give it a minute to load!

By Amy Huang (art stuff), Aileen Virary (sound FX), Adrian Viray (music), Evan Shamoon (music), and Aquma (programming). We made it during a chill weekend in January.

Controls are Left and Right arrows to move, space bar for actions. It will reset at the end if you want to play again. Thanks.
